original_text: I was very happy when I heard news about you. Some Christian friends came here to tell me about you. They said that you are living in a good way. That is the way that God's true message tells us to live. John Introduction
korean_text: 형제들이 와서 네게 있는 진리를 증언하되 네가 진리 안에서 행한다 하니 내가 심히 기뻐하노라

sentences.original_text: when I heard news about you
that you are living in a good way
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 좋은 방식으로 살고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that God's true message tells us to live
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 진실한 메시지가 우리에게 살라고 말하는
